Name: Casio MS-80B Standard Function Desktop Calculator

ReviewList.Text: GREAT little calculator.  I keep it in my bill paying basket, very handy.
Excellent.  Would buy again.
Nice, easy to use calculator ....solar with basic functions and much more.

I just received and used this calculator, and it's a steal. It replaces a much pricier HP 12C Platinum Calculator, which I'd gotten about five years ago when I needed the more advanced functions. I'd bought two of the HP 12C's, to have one as backup, and they were nothing like the 12Cs of before -- the keys malfunctioned on both of the 12Cs within just 25-50 uses (sticking and more often, not registering at all) and there was no easy fix. I've been tolerating them for the last few years, assuming that was just how calculators were made these days, but finally had enough.I just need basic calculator functions now, and for that, the Casio MS-80B is perfect. The interface is incredibly user friendly, the keys work flawlessly (so far), the display is large and clear, and the solar power is a bonus.I also wanted to clear up several question re: the MS-80B's keypad functions. This model does indeed have both an 'off' key and a delete/backspace key, which prior reviews said this calculator doesn't have. The picture currently displayed on Amazon's official product page (as of this review, 6/21/15) is wrong and shows model MS-80S, which lacks these two functions. It's possible that prior reviewers got the wrong model (?).The MS-80B has both an off key and a delete/backspace key, which sit on the top row of the keypad. The backspace key looks like a right-pointing arrow. I've attached a photo of the MS-80B so you can see for yourself.In sum, this is a great basic calculator, for an amazing price. I did a quick search of the other basic models available on Amazon, and this appears to be the best in terms of value, build, and reviews. I can't speak to its long-term durability, but for this price, I don't think you can go wrong!
works well
To be used in the RV.
Easy to read digital display which is what I bought it for. A great little desktop calculator.
Very nice large calculator that I use at home and at work. It is easy to use and easy to see. The large numbers are great. It helps me do accounting at work and study for exams.
this calculator is cheap but funny, i can't get the job done. never buy cheap stuff.
Finally, a calculator with numbers big enough for my middle aged eyes to see, and a back up battery so it works even if my office lamp is off....
I am surprised by how much I miss the back arrow button.  That really makes this calculator a pain to use unless you hit every button right every time.
Quality performance

Had the same calculator for at least 10 years and one day it starting making mistakes. Went to Amazon and there it was! Was so pleased I bought two of them because my husband "borrows" mine all the time. Works as well as the original.

This is a very nice, compact calculator with large, easy-to-read numbers. It also runs on solar as well as a replaceable battery, and has a 3-digit comma marker.  Best of all, it's inexpensive. Puts those dollar-store calculators to shame.
perfect for my use - easy to use and the right size
simple and accurate. I like "easy to use"
Very clear, large display.  Nice product for the price and Casio quality.
Great product!

This is a great value for a fine calculator.  Large number pads plus an easy to read display make this a terrific machine for seniors or those that spend a lot of time running numbers. The percent key is less than intuitive hence the 4 stars.  Once you figure it out it is ok but cumbersome. If you do a lot of currency conversions or need to add tax to a calculation those functions are quite handy.  All in all a super buy.

I am writing this review not only for this calculator but for its predecessor, the Casio MS-80V which I have owned and used for 32 years and it has been used every day and has not failed.  AMAZING!!  The battery or the solar panel has never failed and all the buttons and functions still work!  If this is indicative of the future performance of this new model the MS-80B, which I have owned for about a week, I am certain that it will be a great product also......and it certainly seems so!  I give both of them 5 plus stars and highly recommend the purchase of the new model.  What product made today lasts without fail for 32 years!?.......Buy several of this new model before they run out and especially at this price!
Sleek modern design, looks and works great
Replacing one that finally wore out after over 10 years of use.  I have faith that the new one will perform and last as long.
Excellent for what it;s intended for.
Very convenient.  Always keep one by my side for business.

This is such an important item to have around the house that I didn't realize it until I got it. It looks good and it's big enough to see the numbers and even typing is very easy and to top it of is it fits big fingers,seriously. I have little tiny hands but my friend loves that calculator.
I've had a similar model at my office and bought this for home front.....happy with purchase.  Like the tax tab for quick calculations when buying locally to know final price.
This calculator is the best...I had to buy another because I lost my last one in a move.  I'm never without one of these in the house.  They last forever.
great product
I like it!  Big screen and easy to use!!!

Beware! I fell for "Top Selling" Amazon title... and it broke after light use for less than 9 mos. It just kept putting in the number 9 when trying to add, subtract, times, divide, etc. For example, if I want to multiple 2x2, I would enter 2 then hit the X and then it would put "29" in my display. If I did 2+2 it would still but 29 in the display. 3x3 or 3-3 or 3/3 it would put 39 in the display and so on. Spoke to Casio's tech help desk and it was determined unfixable (even after being put on hold a little while as wanted to see if I could reset it somehow). It is now officially junk and the tech help never even heard of this problem...that is never good news. I thought Casio would be a good brand name so I would not have to deal with this type of problem...where are the simple good quality calculators at???
the best old school style
I'm very happy with everything service was great product was as describe Thanks and keep up the great work.

My husband and I are both fussy about calculators. We don't want a tiny one because we want our hands free, and we want a desktop version to be sturdy enough without being huge desk space hogs. This has been the answer for both of us. It has a sturdy feel to the keys when you use it, it stays put on the desk and doesn't "run away" as you're using it, but it's still portable enough to throw into my backpack for school on those "you will need a calculator" days.
old but still using. good calculator

I bought this to replace the almost exact same model Casio calculator that I have had for 17 years. The old one still worked but keys were getting sticky.  I used it on my very busy loan officer desk for 17 years, spilled coffee, soda, and ice cream on it and it still worked! After I got the new one I felt curious to see if I could open the calculator case to make the keys work better. The case popped open with 2 screws and a couple of easy catches. Inside was a silicone pad under the keys. I wiped off the underside of the keys and washed the silicone pad and the reassembled calculator works perfect, like new!!! I gave the old calculator to the granddaughters and they love it. I think I paid 7 or 8 bucks for this calculator. That is as much as you might spend for one of those big coffee drinks and this lasts virtually through a working career!! No remorse on this one!!
Casio MS-80B arrived promptly and well-packed.  Perfect little calculator for my needs.
Large  and Good
Great product!

Giving this five stars because of its large screen size that doesn't seem conspicuous and annoying. Buttons are big and visible enough for people who have low muscle memory. If you run out of batteries, it has a little solar panel that absorbs energy from the sun. Casio is always, and will have the best footing in the calculator industry.
Price cheap , quality is very good shipping also pleased quickly and overall

Purchased 4 of these for adults with disabilities.  The number and keys were large and easy to touch.  After 5 months they continue to work on math problems and feel inspired that they are learning something with a new way of doing math.  These clients range from 20 to 62.
love it
Works by even low light source with battery backup available, decent sized (not too large not too small, lol) keys & display.
Big Desk top Calculator
It's a Casio, great product!

I received MS-80B model instead of MS-80S mentioned by the seller. The MS-80B is an upgraded version as it has additional buttons. Square root and play buttons have been added in the top row. See attached picture.This is a great calculator for small business or home office. I bought Casio MS-80TV almost 7 years ago and it still works great. Few years ago I picked up office max tax calculator from a local store and I always get frustrated while using it .The buttons in office max ones are crappy, poor build quality, and one has to put lot of pressure on buttons to make it work. Using office max calculator makes me appreciate the Casio calculator.The MS - 80B I just received looks magnificent. The build quality has greatly improved and it works flawlessly. The calculator has a high end appliance look and has exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended.
great
Just what I wanted.  Good calculator for the price.
Great calculator!
Fast Shipping, exactly as described

Can't believe I'm leaving a review for a cheap calculator! It might save someone the trouble of dealing with it though. It's a Casio, they make perfectly good calculators, but this one is a real dud! The "feature" regarding tax insinuates itself with everything else you try to do and you can never get it to clear in entirety. Really bothersome and frustrating; plowing through to get a simple calculation accomplished. The numbers went screwy after about a month of occasional use, only partially appearing on the screen. But that's not all, they also switch value! Unbelievable, but true. You press nine and it shows 9 on the screen, after you press another number that 9 turns into a 3... i kid you not. Into the trash. Definitely not a bargain for ten bucks! Save yourself some trouble.
It's an easy to use calculator.
I keep buying these when they finally die (and it takes forever for them to die). Love the Casio brand! Versatile, functional! Excellent!
Perfect for me, the numbers are large, easy to read screen. I use at home to manage our banking, bills and taxes.
Great calculator, especially for the money.

This is just what I wanted for doing taxes, adding up household expenses, etc.  The keyboard is smooth to operate, big enough to see well even without my glasses but not so big as to be ridiculous.  It is angled so the display is easy to see while it sits on my desk.  Great little calculator.
Great
Works great, easy to read
Works just fine.
This was a replacement for one I have had for many, many years.  Great for balancing checkbook.
Works great.  Just what we needed for the kitchen.
Did not turn on from the outset.  And I do know it is solar powered---but even after sitting in sunlight, it does not turn on.
Industry standard. Finally replacing my original CASIO calculator that we use every day. Only took 13 years! Great unit!
Bought 2 of them because I spilled water on my ten year old one. But before they arrived my old one started working again.
Works good, great price.
Really pleased with the calculator, it's a little small for a desk unit but the contrast on the screen makes it easy to read.
nice
Exactly what I needed for my home office.Right size, right functions.
Great calculator with large buttons and easy to use!  I make use of this calculator on a daily basis, for my business, and truly like using it!

Just a good desktop calculator that works well and is easy to read. I say desktop because I think it's better suited to that with the angled view, larger physical size and lack of cover versus a "backpack" style. The button spacing makes it easier to quickly key in digits without error.
large and clear

This is exactly what I was looking for.  I do not need a paper tape. This is the best size for my use and the buttons as well as the display are clear and legible. I would have preferred it to have an "OFF" button just to save the battery but my previous unit worked the same... turns off by itself after a couple of minutes.
Perfect simple function calculator because the buttons always work.
This is exactly what I needed.
Works Well... no problems.

Excellent medium size desktop calculator.  The buttons are a nice size with a soft (& quiet) feel and it does everything a basic calculator needs to do. It also has a nice size solar panel as well as a good responsive contrast display.  Great buy at a great price.
I love this little calculator. I had a Casio just like this for 10 years so I bought another one after the first one finally died. It's so inexpensive and it's perfect for my needs.
It's kinda smaller than what I thought, but it works well.I like it.
It is so good. I totally recommend it. It is very easy to use.
Nice little calculator for the money
Simple, classic

I am somewhat disappointed with the functions.  No "clear entry, memory recall, square root" for example.  And the monetary conversion is kind of useless unless you are always using the same two currencies.
it works well even in a  dimly lit room.........
Best little basic calculator I have bought.  Easy to read and stable on the desk.  The angled display is a big plus.  You can always depend on Casio.
great calculator for figuring out discounts in a store. very easy to operate
This is just an awsome buy and it's got a big read out and big buttons. I paid $9.40 and now it's a Prime item $8.64

I was looking for a new calculator to use at my desk at work and decided upon this one.  This is a solid calculator with a low profile that will help reduce hand strain. The buttons are hard plastic which I prefer over rubber buttons that some other calculators use. The hard plastic gives a solid feel, so you know when you push a button, it registered.  The display is tilted up toward the user at a slight angle but is not adjustable. However, he viewing angle of the display is good even when the calculator is several feet away.The bottom of the calculator has two rubber feet to prevent the calculator from moving on the desk. The bottom edges are curved which feels comfortable if you are holding the calculator in your hand while using it.I experimented with the currency exchange mode and it works, but I will not use it often. I do like the tax rate feature which will come in handy for calculating sales tax.The calculator does come with some very basic instructions, but this is not a problem since this is a fairly simple calculator to use.The calculator switches from solar power to battery power without any indication. This is good since your data will never be lost. It is easy to change the battery by removing two phillips head screws from the back of the calculator.I will be using this calculator dozens of times a day at the office and feel that it is a great value. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a small desktop calculator.  Very pleased with this purchase!
Ofcourse Casio calculators are the best!
works great
Finally found one that works great compared to other models.  Sounds silly but it is the truth after trying about 5 others.
Great, simple and inexpensive
Nice, little & simple function calculator. It does just what it is supposed to do. Reasonably priced.
Better than I expected.
works great--easy to read--just wish the angle was better
works great.
Perfect little calculator to have in each desk at home.  Easy to read, easy to use.
Easy plastic responsive buttons that never miss an input. I use this for accounting class and it helps me on exams be quicker.
Got this as a stocking stuffer for my aunt who had been wanting g a bigger calculator. She loved it. All the needed functions, great size and good price.
works good
Large enough to make easy to read and use.

Very good calculator for business transactions. Have been using these for 4 years straight, and they're still going. I bought this one because I needed an extra one. Easy to set up currency exchange and tax +- option.
Perfect calculator for my financial accounting class as well as everyday calculations. The keys register with the first push every time. A great buy!

My desk calculator had finally given up on me, and I had that desk calculator since HIGHSCHOOL and I am a few years out of college already! But as all good things do come to an eventual end, my calculator did and when I went looking on amazon for a replacement, they sure don't make my few decades old calculator anymore, so I went with this one...and it's perfect for my needs. I guess it was about time for an upgrade as far as desktop calculators go. :) It's solar powered so I love how I don't have to worry about changing out the batteries...and it's fairly easy to turn on. The buttons are big enough...and I like the basic-ness of it.
Was exactly what I was looking for. Was a great purchase
Good Value! I love it!
Has the tax button where i am used to.
Good, simple calculator with easily read details.  Good price delivered to my door which is better than forgetting a new one EVERY time when I was at the store. ;-)
Best cheap calculator out there with tax function. I have 3 of them at my business.
just what you can expect from a calculator.Big screen, big numbers, does the work.
Nice size, easy to use, even with fat fingers.
